name: Sneaky Run
description:
The earth has been invaded by aliens! Run as fast as you can to warn the others, but make sure not to move when the UFO's light is over you...

FEATURES
◉ Simple one-touch controls
◉ Awesome pixel art
◉ 96 levels with more to come
◉ 8 Different lands to discover
◉ Spooky soundtracks
◉ Compete with friends on Game Center leaderboards
